Best time to go to Santa Maria Average weather of Santa Maria, California

When is the best time to go to Santa Maria?

When is the best time to go to Santa Maria? Here's some information to help you in your decision:

The best months for good weather in Santa Maria are March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October and November

On average, the warmest months are June, July, August, September and October

Santa Maria has dry periods in May, June, July, August and September

The coldest months are January, February and December

The rainiest months are January, February and March

Weather and climate in Santa Maria

Santa Maria enjoys a warm-summer Mediterranean climate in accordance with the Köppen-Geiger classification. The yearly average maximum temperature in Santa Maria is 22°C (ranging from 18°C in december to 28°C in september). Annual rainfall is 317mm, with a minimum of 2mm in june and a maximum of 67mm in january.

From january to may the climate is good. It is for example 22°C as maximum temperature in may.

Between the months of june and october the climate is very good. By early evening, the temperature averages 17°C and it rains about 17mm each month.

From november to december the climate is beautiful. By early evening, the temperature averages 12°C and, in december, 2 days of rain are expected.

Tourist seasons in Santa Maria

Very low season in Santa Maria

Low season in Santa Maria

The months with low numbers of tourists are: March, April, May and December.

High season in Santa Maria

The number of visitors to Santa Maria is high in: June, September and October.

Peak season in Santa Maria

The largest number of tourists visiting Santa Maria is during: July and August.

Best time for low prices in Santa Maria

Average prices of hotels in Santa Maria month by month

Generally, December is the month with the lowest hotel prices in Santa Maria. So this is a great time to save on your holiday! In contrast, July is statistically the most expensive month of the year for hotels.

Average price of hiring a car in Santa Maria

On average, it costs $ 120 per day to hire a car in Santa Maria. This price varies by $ 31 depending on the month. In november, hiring a car costs an average of $ 102 per 24 hours, so this is the best time to save money! In contrast, the average price in april is $ 133.
